Title: Save Little Red Riding Hood!
Plot: The Wonder Pets once again travel to the puppet theater, this time to save Little Red Riding Hood. The Big Bad Wolf is chasing her, but she doesn't believe she's in any danger. The wolf acts as if he's friendly to trick her, while secretly plotting to eat both her and her grandmother.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
